GisGeometryStreamWriter Class Reference

#include <GeometryStreamWriter.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inheritance diagram for GisGeometryStreamWriter:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisGeometryStreamWriter class is a writer for geometric data (abstract). The destination for the data is defined by the implementation. GisGeometryStreamWriter is a helper type and does not inherit from GisIGeometry.

Definition at line 35 of file GeometryStreamWriter.h.

virtual GISGEOM_API void WriteDirectPosition (GisIDirectPosition *value)=0
 Writes a geometric position into the stream. The position's dimension is taken from the position, itself.
virtual GISGEOM_API void WriteDouble (double value)=0
 Writes one number as a "double" into the stream.
